dashboard.label: Entrevistas por Universidad
dashboard.description: Gráfica de barras interactiva que permite redirigir a dashboards específicos según la universidad seleccionada.

search.query: | dbxquery query="SELECT u.Name AS Universidad, COUNT(t.Id) AS Entrevistas FROM Tickets t JOIN Sites s ON t.SiteId = s.Id JOIN Universities u ON s.UniversityId = u.Id GROUP BY u.Name ORDER BY Entrevistas DESC;" connection="lotus"

| dbxquery query=" SELECT CONCAT(u.Name, ' - ', CASE WHEN f.GetIn = TRUE THEN 'Ventas Cerradas' ELSE 'Ventas No Cerradas' END ) AS AgrupacionYEstado, COUNT(*) AS Total FROM Forms f JOIN Tickets t ON f.Id = t.FormId JOIN Sites s ON t.SiteId = s.Id JOIN Universities u ON s.UniversityId = u.Id GROUP BY u.Name, f.GetIn ORDER BY Total DESC; " connection="lotus"

| dbxquery query=" SELECT CONCAT( u.Name, ' - ', DATE(t.Created) ) AS Agrupación, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.Presentation = 0 OR f.Presentation IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Presentación y atención inmediata al prospecto\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.InstituteWelcome = 0 OR f.InstituteWelcome IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Saludo institucional\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.NeedsIdentification = 0 OR f.NeedsIdentification IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Identificación de necesidades\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.EducationalOffer = 0 OR f.EducationalOffer IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Conocimiento de oferta educacional\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.ObjectionManagment = 0 OR f.ObjectionManagment IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Manejo de objeciones\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.SellClose = 0 OR f.SellClose IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Cierre de venta\" FROM Forms f JOIN Tickets t ON f.Id = t.FormId JOIN Sites s ON t.SiteId = s.Id JOIN Universities u ON s.UniversityId = u.Id GROUP BY CONCAT(u.Name, ' - ', DATE(t.Created)) ORDER BY DATE(t.Created) ASC, Agrupación ASC; " connection="lotus"

| dbxquery query=" SELECT CONCAT( u.Name, ' - ', DATE(t.Created) ) AS Agrupación, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.Presentation = 0 OR f.Presentation IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Presentación y atención inmediata al prospecto\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.InstituteWelcome = 0 OR f.InstituteWelcome IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Saludo institucional\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.NeedsIdentification = 0 OR f.NeedsIdentification IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Identificación de necesidades\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.EducationalOffer = 0 OR f.EducationalOffer IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Conocimiento de oferta educacional\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.ObjectionManagment = 0 OR f.ObjectionManagment IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Manejo de objeciones\", COUNT(CASE WHEN f.SellClose = 0 OR f.SellClose IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS \"Cierre de venta\" FROM Forms f JOIN Tickets t ON f.Id = t.FormId JOIN Sites s ON t.SiteId = s.Id JOIN Universities u ON s.UniversityId = u.Id GROUP BY CONCAT(u.Name, ' - ', DATE(t.Created)) ORDER BY DATE(t.Created) ASC, Agrupación ASC; " connection="lotus"
